testcase.name: Get the userdetails of id 3
testcase.system-out: * header Accept = 'application/json' ...................................... passed * def response_expected = read('../utils/result2.json') ................... passed * def feature = read('UserDetails.feature@smoke') ......................... passed * def finalresult = call feature .......................................... passed Given url sourceurl ....................................................... passed When method GET ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == response_expected[1] ................................ passed Then print 'From different featurefile result',response ................... passed * def firstname = finalresult.response.data.first_name .................... passed Then print 'Firstname Userdetails id 2 is',firstname ...................... passed
